Title.battle_title: Happy New Year Major Bake for CMRT Winter Mod

Scenario.description: Semi-Historical Battle along the wind swept steppe west of Stalingrad (H2H;German;Soviet in that order)
The Advance Guard of a German Kampfgruppe of the 3rd Panzer Division must seize a pair of critical bridges on the Kielce-Opatow Road. Axis Human vs AI only.
2/9/1944 German SPW section tasked to provide close protection to two immobilised Panzer IVs against Soviet tank hunting teams. Play Ger vs Sov AI; H2H Only.
5th Panzer Divisions counterattack versus 5th Guards Army near Orsha.
Russian spearhead forces liberate two forced labor camps. Play either side, Allies preferred.
Another hard fought small place. AIG.
11/8/44 0800Hrs KG "von Schroif" is tasked to secure the Line of Departure for a planned assault to secure a bridgehead over the CZARNA River.
3SS Totenkopf attacks the Soviet 31st Army's bridgehead over the Nemen. Axis vs. AI or H2H
Soviet squads raid a German listening post. Allies only.
19th Panzer Division cleans up the Augustow Forest. Playable in all modes
Fight along a river.
Remnents of Fourth Armies 25th Panzergrenadier divison try and hold a small village against a armor heavy soviet force of the Third Belorussian Front
Railyard Meeting Engagement
23 June 1944 Lesson 2 Tactical Reconnaissance of enemy held sector to provide information to support kampgruppe commander's next course of action. Play as Ger Vs Sov AI
German Panzergrenadiers secure their jumping off position for a future attack. June 1944. Axis vs AI only
A German tank destoryer battalion faces a soviet armoured assault. Play as Axis or Allies

Title.battle_title: Run Real Time (H2H or Axis vs AI exit battle)

Scenario.description: The stragglers must find their way across open farmland.
21st August 1944 An advance detachment of the 233rd Tank brigade, equipped with 'Emchas', conducts a deep raid during the JASSY-KISHINEV op. PLAY RED vs AI; H2H ONLY.
An infantry battalion reinforced with tanks and engineers is about to breach the the third defensive line of the 78th Sturm Division. [Soviet Human vs Axis AI only]
Soviet forces pursue retreating Germans - best played as Allied vs Axis AI
A German second line of defence fight for their lives against an overpowering Red Army attack. Best played as German vs AI, not balanced for H2H
AIG
April 27, 1945, Germany, 4th Guards restarts drive toward Dresden against 21st Panzer Division. Play Allied v AI, H2H
Kampfgruppe von Saucken tries to reopen the road to Minsk, recently closed by a Soviet Mechanized Corps. Play as Axis vs AI or H2H (though not tested H2H)
AI plans for both sides are available for this fast to play battle in the heat of the summer. The maps is historial but the battle is hypotheical.
Soviet partisans launch a daring attack on a German flak position while they are preoccupied with an air raid. Suggest Partisans vs AI or H2H first.
30/6/44 A Soviet armoured forward detachment races ahead to seize a crucial bridge defended by a rag tag unit of Germans. Play Soviet Vs German AI; H2H; Vs Soviet AI
H2H "Bagration Cup 44" Round one Knockout tournament
Soviet recon persue German stragglers who have taken refuge in a local church - awaiting rescue. Allied vs AI only. Tiny scenario.
7th Panzer Division prevents a Soviet break out west of the Nieman River. Playable in all modes
Russian Assault on semi-prepared German position - Fictional Scenario to be played H2H on level IRON
26 Oct 1944 - elements of the Grossdeutschland Division fight off Soviet armour in Lithuania
Grossdeutschland attempts to relieve Konigsberg
